chapters.title: Understanding Blockchain Technology
chapters.summary: This chapter delves into the fundamental aspects of blockchain technology, exploring its origins, evolution, and core concepts.

chapters.title: Key Components of Blockchain
chapters.summary: This chapter examines the essential components that make up a blockchain, including nodes, transactions, blocks, and consensus mechanisms.

chapters.title: Principles of Blockchain
chapters.summary: This chapter discusses the foundational principles of blockchain, such as decentralization, transparency, immutability, and security.

chapters.title: Blockchain in Action
chapters.summary: This chapter provides real-world examples of blockchain applications, highlighting its use cases in various industries and its potential for future innovations.
